org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect

Class RequestObjectValidatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect.RequestObjectValidatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestObjectValidator

    public class RequestObjectValidatorImpl
extends Object
implements RequestObjectValidator
    This class validates request object parameter value which comes with the OIDC authorization request as an optional parameter
